name: Treasure Island Sailing Center
description: The Treasure Island Sailing Center is a non-profit organization whose mission is to improve our community and the sport of sailing by providing access, facilities, and sailing instruction to people of all socioeconomic backgrounds, skill levels, and physical abilities.
fullDescription: The Treasure Island Sailing Center is a non-profit organization whose mission is to improve our community and the sport of sailing by providing access, facilities, and sailing instruction to people of all socioeconomic backgrounds, skill levels, and physical abilities.
whatTheyOffer: The Treasure Island Sailing Center (TISC) is a non-profit organization whose mission is to improve our community and the sport of sailing by providing sailing education access, facilities, and sailing instruction to people of all socioeconomic backgrounds, skill levels, and physical abilities.
